Title: Lucky
Plot: After Alison has a terrible dream of her soldier brother dying, she gets a surprise at her front door. Meanwhile, Allison and Devalos work on an arson case and Allison has trouble getting information from the ghost of a young girl who died in the fire.
GuestStars: Ryan Hurst, Jay Ferguson, Colby French, Susan Beaubian, Blaine Saunders, Ingrid Coree
